name: AdGuard-Home Dark
description:
A dark theme for the AdGuard-Home web interface. I have tried to address all parts of the interface other than the initial installation process, but some may have been overlooked.

I sometimes make dark CSS themes and JS userscripts. Some of them aren't terrible.

user.name: ultrabenosaurus
user.about:
I like reading, collecting games on Steam, tinkering with web stuff, and technology in general.

I sometimes make dark CSS themes and JS userscripts. Some of them aren't terrible.

additional_info:
Instructions
You will need to specify the IP address or internal domain name on which you are running your installation of AdGuard-Home.

Credits
Originally based on CSS by GitHub user carlbennett in this issue thread, it has been heavily altered and expanded on primarily for navigation elements and the Query Log.

Apologies
I apologise to anyone who does CSS for a living as I have done this with a brute-force method and it could probably be a lot more elegant.

Changelog
v1.6 - Apparently the Query Log has blue rows for PTR / "Rewritten by the hosts file rule" entries; now they're dark blue instead of nearly white.
v1.5 -
    • Now works with the Tags section of the New Client modal.
    • Changed default font from inherit to sans-serif.
v1.4 - Added rules for new Block buttons in the Top Clients panel of the Dashboard.
v1.3 -
    • Changed loading overlays on Query Log page from white to black.
    • Fixed background colour of inline action buttons on the Query Log page.
v1.2 - Added styling for the new version alert banner.
v1.1 - Fix the mobile navigation menu styles.
